A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All the spectacle you could ask for\, and a more nuanced and thoughtful star wars than I've seen in my lifetime.   If you told me I'd live to see the day when Star Trek movies were dumb actioners while Star Wars became the series with thoughtful observations on the economic inequalities behind fascism and made a villain at once pitiful and terrifying\, I don't think I could have believed it\n\nFor me\, this is a shake up the Star Wars world really needed to get out of idolatry and regurgitation of jokes past.
